create_response.prompt: Continue from the reference frame with the same character, costume, materials, lighting, and framing. Single continuous shot, no cuts. No readable text, no logos, no watermarks. Perfect loop: last frame == first frame (pose, tools, lighting, background match). She's reaching off-screen with a ridged chitinous hand-drill thing, boring into something with these stunningly beautiful amber sparks cascading out like tiny fireworks, then switching to a bone-plated seam welder that leaves behind glowing resin trails so pretty it's almost emotional, before pulling the tools back to rest and looping the whole alien construction job again.
